website_summaries.verdict: This Clairol product is a good choice for guys who are looking for semi-permanent color to cover gray for a result that doesn't look too dark or fake.
pros: Designed for men to color gray and enhance natural color
Works in 10 minutes and can last through as many as 28 shampoos
Contains vitamin E and aloe that can improve the texture and appearance of hair
cons: Rare reports of brassy results, and of allergic reactions

customer_reviews.title: If you are allergic to JFM, Don't use this!
customer_reviews.text: Looked for an alternative to JFM, which made me itch for days and caused redness and blistering. This product also has PPD's like JFM, and had a similar result. Have since moved on to Henna- while less convenient, is a good chemical-free way to get good results. I use Manly Guy, but there are several available on Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Rand

customer_reviews.title: Works Great on Beards!
customer_reviews.text: I used this product to dye my beard and it is the best. There is no tacky red tint and it never irritated my skin. You need to know that the colors run darker than stated, so 'medium' brown actually comes out darker brown. That being said, this is a great product which is not always easy to find it stores, so, thank you, Amazon, for carrying it at a reasonable price.
customer_reviews.author: Scott K.

customer_reviews.title: Chemical burn
customer_reviews.text: This product gives a serious chemical burn if you don't want a burn like this on your face don't buy it
customer_reviews.author: robert c russo jr

customer_reviews.title: Love This Product!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great hair color product. Easy to use and excellent results. I have dark brown hair, but use Light Brown color and it works great. Entire process takes about 35 min. from initial application to final rinse. Color lasts a long time. I re- color about every 3 weeks, and that's just because my hair grows so fast that my silver roots become blatantly obvious. (Not that I think I'm fooling anyone, it just looks weird...) I highly recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: G. Brooks Arnold

customer_reviews.title: Bad product
customer_reviews.text: I used this product just once only a small amount and I found out in the hardest way possible how harsh the product was after it had irritated my skin and gave me 4 days of painful blisters that honestly I had to miss 2 days of work. My face was swollen due to the allergic reaction and I had to apply cortizone cream to calm down the inflammation and also orally administered benadryl. In my opinion, it's a bad product that still incorporates harsh chemicals. It might work for other people.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: great product !
customer_reviews.text: i contemplated buying this for the last couple of years , but was afraid to change from,,, Just for men... which i have used for several years , thier product works ok , but they barley give you enough product to cover your hair ! , and it only lasts about two weeks , before your hair starts going back to grey , and the rest of the non grey hair starts looking orange...... the NATURALS hair color comes with plenty of product to cover all of my hair , and they include a conditioner that makes the color last a good month or more , i will continue to use the NATURALS over Just for Men...
customer_reviews.author: craig

customer_reviews.title: Nothing "Natural" about this product.
customer_reviews.text: I've been looking for an alternative beard dye to the Just For Men Product that produced such painful, blistering chemical burns and allergic and chemical reaction that I nearly needed to go to the ER. I wrongly assumed this product was different based solely on the product's name (stupid me I know)I Granted I should have paid special attention to the warnings and ingredients on the box. I don't know what else to rate this product. It may work for some who don't have this common allergic reaction (you can google how common it actually is) but at the same time I feel their product labeling is misleading. Anyway, buyer beware. It's the same stuff as in Just For Men.
customer_reviews.author: Dino

customer_reviews.title: It doesn't color your hair, no matter how long you leave it in.
customer_reviews.text: I have medium brown hair that's about 60 percent gray now, and I've been using Just for Men hair color for many years. But I wanted to try this because Just for Men burns and itches a bit. But, amazingly, the problem with the Clairol Natural Instincts is that it doesn't color your hair, at all. Even after my last desperate try when I left it in for 45 minutes. So if you want something that doesn't sting or burn, but doesn't color your hair, this is what you're looking for. But if you want something that actually colors your hair, you're going to have to use Just for Men and put up with a little temporary discomfort.
customer_reviews.author: Mitch

customer_reviews.title: If you get the time right its good
customer_reviews.text: It's the best I have found for medium brown hair for men. I've used women's die and they always put some red in it. The only problem with this is you have to figure out your time window. It says leave in for 10 minute 20 for stubborn gray the difference between 10 & 20 Minutes is a lot. At 10 you have some gray left at 20 you look like someone spray painted your head. . I don't like a monochromatic look to my hair so I leave it in 12 and get a little gray, a little light brown and mostly dark brown.
customer_reviews.author: Two Girls

customer_reviews.title: Became allergic over time
customer_reviews.text: Was using this on my greying goatee beard when I was going on job interviews. After a few months I became sensitized to it and started getting a red rash above my mustache. Luckily I don't need to use it anymore.
customer_reviews.author: Mountain Man

customer_reviews.title: Works great ... One box multiple times
customer_reviews.text: Works fine. Color is dark. Get used to how long you leave it on before rinsing. Time the process to determine how dark you like it. If you leave it on too long think of excuses when you see friends and they say your hair looks darker. Like ... "I stood on my head for better brain circulation after drinking a big glass of black cherry juice. Boy I won't do that again." Something like that. Then change the subject. :-)
customer_reviews.author: Philip Marland

customer_reviews.title: Caused an awful reaction....
customer_reviews.text: I had an awful reaction to this product. Redness and swelling to my face, awful itching. I performed the Allergy test and everything seemed fine, but it still caused a horrible reaction. I'll be sticking with natural dyes, these chemicals are horrendous.
customer_reviews.author: danny

customer_reviews.title: Makes you look younger too
customer_reviews.text: The hair gye is easy to use and covers well. It has less chemicals than the Just for men products. That's why I started with it long ago. covers well but doesn't make you look like you're wearing a helmet! Also some technique to that too. Hair dye easy too use. mix it in bottle shake it, and use whole thing if need to do so. Many times I mix what I need and apply it to areas I missed and are sowing a it. How much of each component you mix will determine the thickness too. Ok long enough.
customer_reviews.author: MRR

customer_reviews.title: burned the crap out of my skin
customer_reviews.text: Ive been dying my hair black for 19 years and i have never had a reaction like i did to this box of dye. Ended up having to go to urgent care and got a shot and THREE different meds to clear it up. Something is with this junk
customer_reviews.author: Roni

customer_reviews.title: The name says it, looks natural.
customer_reviews.text: This stuff works much better than the product that seems to monopolize the market in drugstores and department stores (won't mention the name but if you ave looked for men's hair color you know). In my opinion Natural Instincts gives a more natural look, less monochrome and also has less of a tendency to dye your skin as well as your hair (really a bad look with thinning hair). As it turns out buying Natural Instincts from Amazon cost much less than I used to pay for it at the drugstore (when it was available there) even though it is conveniently delivered to my door.
customer_reviews.author: Honest Reviewer

customer_reviews.title: very easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I love how easy to use this is. the color was too dark for me and I could not find a lighter shade. It made my hair feel and look rich, color lasted and it cold not have been easier to use. I may not continue with it unless I can find a lighter shade. the product, though is great.
customer_reviews.author: Joan G

customer_reviews.title: Great hair color that lasts for weeks.
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely the best hair coloring product for men. I have used it for three years and been completely satisfied each time. It is easy to use, cleans up quickly, and best of all gives a great hair color that lasts for several weeks. Compared to other products this is the best one on the market that I have found.
customer_reviews.author: jdd428AZ

customer_reviews.title: Holy caustic chemicals!
customer_reviews.text: Holy crap...don't know what caustic chemicals they use in this dye but it burned the heck outta my face! Tried it on beard without trimming to see how it reacts and did not make it the full set time before I had to jump in shower and wash off cuz it was burning so bad...and I rarely have problems. Threw rest away!
customer_reviews.author: Shawn K.

customer_reviews.title: I’m afraid to use it again!
customer_reviews.text: Even though I bought the lightest brown for my husband, it came out a dark brown and we made sure to follow all the instructions.
customer_reviews.author: SBalint

customer_reviews.title: This is a good product for men
customer_reviews.text: This is a good product for men. Hair looks natural, with gray blended away, not the fake dyed look. It does come out darker than the picture. If you leave on longer than 10 minutes, it'll turn black. That's not a bad thing, just be aware of it because that may not be the look you're going for. For best results, apply to hair immediately after mixing. If you let it sit it'll get really dark and turn your hair black even within 10 minutes.
customer_reviews.author: sirnatesalot

customer_reviews.title: ONE TIME USE ONLY
customer_reviews.text: I got a set of 3 packs. I opened two of them one after another but both are just for ONE TIME USE ONLY. I need 10% of amount of this at one time so I saved it for next time but never been able to use, it didn't work for 2nd or 3rd time, never gave me the color after first time. I am very upset and can't suggest anyone to wast their money unless they need full one pack for each time.
customer_reviews.author: Fauzaan M.

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: I like it better than just for men. Does not seem as costic or chemically... if those are words. Seems a bit more gentle and it gives more body to the hair. I leave it in longer (about 25 minutes) to really get rid of grey.
customer_reviews.author: Michael A.

customer_reviews.title: Sometimes covers, sometimes doesn't.
customer_reviews.text: It doesn't always cover the gray up on the sideburns which is the spot the gray usually shows up first. I've used a whole bottle on just the front and sides of the head and sometimes the gray will still show through. Make sure you keep the product off your skin like the neckline and ear/sideburn areas or you'll have darker skin for the next couple days before it wears off. Works a lot better than the Just for Men products though. I've used them and most of the time the gray is the same color as before the application.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew

customer_reviews.title: love this stuff
customer_reviews.text: I am a 68 year old woman with short hair, got tired of trying to battle grays. This is a nice color that doesnt damage your hair. It is also a fast and inexpensive way to color your hair. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy even a man can do it
customer_reviews.text: During the pandemic hair shops closed and had to cover up my grays, not that anybody saw them. But this product is easy to use and last 4-6 weeks depending on hair length
customer_reviews.author: scott d gray

customer_reviews.title: Enough for 2 Men or 1 Woman
customer_reviews.text: Unlike Just For Men which barely contains enough for one short haired man, these have enough for at least 2 sets of heads. Grab your gray haired friend, dad, uncle, neighbor, partner, husband, child and have a mini hair color party.
customer_reviews.author: Jin

customer_reviews.title: Product is fine, Amazon only shipped a single unit, when description is count of 3
customer_reviews.text: Product works as expected. I have bought this twice from Amazon. The first time I got the 3 count of the product as advertised. This last time I only received 1 unit, even though the product description is still "Count of 3". Amazon still owes me 2 more units as the cost was about the same both times, the description hasn't changed and they were the seller.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas

customer_reviews.title: This product was recommended by my "hair-care provider"
customer_reviews.text: This product was recommended by my "hair-care provider". She said that it works well on a man's hair, providing a natural look that stays true-to-color between applications, I have found that to be true for several years now. I suppose that at 70 years old I shouldn't bother with this stuff, but that's "not my style". One more thing. I am finding it really difficult to find in stores, so finding it on Amazon at a bargain price is a plus!
customer_reviews.author: Peter SF

customer_reviews.title: Product seemed to be open/tampered with
customer_reviews.text: This product was spilled out in 2 of the 3 boxes,I did not check box #3 yet. The product says light brown but made my hair multi colored. It was as I feared tampered with. hopefully it will wash out sooner then later. I have never had this problem with a product purchased on Amazon. very upsetting , I wish I would have just sent it back
customer_reviews.author: Setting the table with style

customer_reviews.title: Waste of Money!!!
customer_reviews.text: Do NOT BUY! I left it in for the minimal and maximum time amount , even over! Had NO effect! No returns , Complete waste of money , this product should be pulled !! And this was for a very light dye color on certain parts of my hair!
customer_reviews.author: Camnie

customer_reviews.title: Color is WAY to light!
customer_reviews.text: I have used this many times with good results but the last time i bought it the color bottle has VERY LITTLE tint to it. It will not color well at all! Time to find another brand!
customer_reviews.author: D-Man

customer_reviews.title: One to avoid if you are even a little bit sensitive
customer_reviews.text: Great for hair but WATCH out. It has strong chemicals and actually caused some itchy blisters around my beard. I never get any reaction to it with any allergy tests. If you are sensitive to colors and dyes then avoid this product.
customer_reviews.author: Casting Stones

customer_reviews.title: Color is way off
customer_reviews.text: Color comes out on gray .. reddish goldie tint and a Odd brown color. Going back to my old product
customer_reviews.author: Stepheno

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works better than the other stuff I used and I will buy again. Edit.. They recently changed gloves, they are way to small for my hands. I had to read the cover to be sure it's for men not women. If I want to use them without getting anything on my hands, I will have to buy gloves. I'm usually a large glove.
customer_reviews.author: Bob

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use, no Ammonia, looks good and lasts a long time, I highly recommend it
customer_reviews.author: Blackhawks39

customer_reviews.title: Worst  color I have ever used
customer_reviews.text: I have been coloring my hair for months with wash in rinses. I bought this color to make my hair light brown. It is so dark it is almost black!! I would never use this color again and wold not recommend it to my worst enemy. And it didn't even cover my gray roots at the temples! What a waste of time and money. I would rate it no stars if I could. Beware if you expect a light brown!!
customer_reviews.author: MHD

customer_reviews.title: Checking on replacement. Have order before and it was good. Will see how they answer my complaint.
customer_reviews.text: One of the boxes was defective as the liquid was 3/4 empty. Looks like it was not stored correctly as it somehow explode the top so it leaked and evaporated.
customer_reviews.author: Frank Feldt

customer_reviews.title: Wrong color received second time
customer_reviews.text: Not the correct color need natural black not brown. Will be returning this the second order
customer_reviews.author: Eloise Cox

customer_reviews.title: We love this product
customer_reviews.text: We love this product! I had my boyfriend change from Just for men.. It was brassy and dull looking after a couple days. With thisroduct it dulls after three to four weeks! Great product, easy to use and great value!
customer_reviews.author: Yolanda

customer_reviews.title: Better than nothing?
customer_reviews.text: Better than nothing, I guess. Gives my hair a reddish tint. Might just go back to natural. But it does cover up the grey, jut not sure I'm happy enough with the results.
customer_reviews.author: MidwestRegJoe

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t work for me
customer_reviews.text: So I had a great reviews but it didn’t work for me lasted about a week I tried it again with the same results
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work the 2nd time around
customer_reviews.text: This product worked the 1st time I applied to my hair. Since then, the product has not worked. I have tried (6) different times and no results. I gave this product enough chances. I gave 1 star because it worked only once. Would not buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: wasif anwar

customer_reviews.title: This may be why there's a warning about dying your eyebrows.
customer_reviews.text: The chemicals burn. Why do they do that? Bad chemicals, bad!
customer_reviews.author: O.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Needed something that last a long time and this does. Great price
customer_reviews.author: GLENN LOWY

customer_reviews.title: Dont use for facial hair
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to color my beard, using as directed the product only works for about a week at a time (yes, I'm using the color treatment shampoo once a week) . Maybe it works better on head hair, I don't know
customer_reviews.author: samuel

customer_reviews.title: Terrible
customer_reviews.text: I was supposed to receive a three pack of Clairol hair color but when the package arrived it only had one box of hair color in it. Ridiculous.
customer_reviews.author: John N Toohey

customer_reviews.title: Bad
customer_reviews.text: BEWARE. Color stayed on my gray hair for about 2 days, and washed out. I don't know if they sent outdated product or what. NO RETURN ALLOWED.
customer_reviews.author: Michael S.

customer_reviews.title: Reduce or remove the grey.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for getting to the grey in my hair. I cut the time from 10 to 8 minutes which left in some of the grey looking natural with a touch of grey.
customer_reviews.author: CARL MEISTER

customer_reviews.title: This product was apparently sold past its expiration date. ...
customer_reviews.text: This product was apparently sold past its expiration date. Mixture was watery and produced very dark brown results instead of the expected light brown. Used 2 out of the 3 in the package, and both produced unacceptable results.
customer_reviews.author: photobuff

customer_reviews.title: Works very well
customer_reviews.text: Simple directions, color fades after about 4 weeks. Using color-treated shampoo does help extend the life of the color. Keep in mind, keeping the chemical in for 15 minutes vs. 10 minutes during treatment makes the color much darker, so be aware!
customer_reviews.author: Glen

customer_reviews.title: Perfect color for my hair
customer_reviews.text: Perfect color for my hair. It's the best stuff I've found for me. I cut it in half since my hair is fairly short; compared to a woman. So I get two applications and this is a great price even for one. I always stock up on this stuff because I never know if they're going to discontinue it. I hope they never stop making this.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Schairer

customer_reviews.title: Barely Covers the Gray
customer_reviews.text: The product is a one-time use product and it’s expensive for that. The biggest drawback of this product is that it barely colors all the gray hairs even after intense application. I bought the 3-pack and each application has been bad as the others.
customer_reviews.author: TxTechie

customer_reviews.title: Okay but could be improved
customer_reviews.text: I am 63 years old and I have used this product, and Men's Choice before it, for some time now. I use it for coloring both facial and head hair in increments (i.e. - not the whole bottle at a time). Though it is not formally recommended for facial hair, the same comments hold: the color does not hold as long as advertised and some hairs seem to not color at all. Having said this, some gray being "exposed" is also more natural for a person who looks old enough to have SOME gray hair - I just wish the color lasted as long as advertised and its not close!
customer_reviews.author: Chris Black

customer_reviews.title: Did not work for me
customer_reviews.text: Easy application and clean up was a breeze BUT did not color my hair.
customer_reviews.author: Revrom

customer_reviews.title: Great color
customer_reviews.text: So far it has not stained my pillow like Just for men did so very happy with it and the color is very good.
customer_reviews.author: Cloudy

customer_reviews.title: It’s not non allergy dye!
customer_reviews.text: I still got allergy reaction all over my face.i will not recommend this product to any body.im trying to send it back to you but you don’t want it, what a waste. s So people don’t buy this product!
customer_reviews.author: rodolfo s.

customer_reviews.title: Don't go around looking older than you are!!
customer_reviews.text: It does the job and hides those blonde-silver like hairs, without all those harsh chemicals. If you are going to lie about your age, at least look the part.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Marx

customer_reviews.title: I only received one packet instead of 3 like the order’s description
customer_reviews.text: I only received one packet instead of 3 like the order’s description. I intended to use 3 times but very disappointed
customer_reviews.author: mini_Hulk

customer_reviews.title: Try a test area to verify allergic reaction to dye !
customer_reviews.text: Even if it contains natural ingredients, allergic reactions evident by swelling ears, itchy and burning skin/scalp.
customer_reviews.author: ronald bowling

customer_reviews.title: waste of money..cheating product
customer_reviews.text: worst product just throwed out .. it is not sticky when you mix so watery also lots of itching after applying becareful .. this is not even worth of 1 start just gave sack of writting review
customer_reviews.author: Sasikumar Dasarathan

customer_reviews.title: The color lasts for 2-3 weeks easily and I use single bottle 2-3 times
customer_reviews.text: I have been using it for 2 years and I am a fan of it. The color lasts for 2-3 weeks easily (even after hot/warm shower) and I use single bottle 2-3 times.
customer_reviews.author: MA

customer_reviews.title: Not good gray hair covering.
customer_reviews.text: I've been using Clairol for many year in a darker shade. This one does not cover the gray hair properly and washes out rapidly. Based on my experience I would not recommend this color/product.
customer_reviews.author: lifeisgood

customer_reviews.title: Dyes facial skin
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy for beards as promoted - cannot be returned to Amazon. So stuck with it!
customer_reviews.author: Shaw

customer_reviews.title: works well but still burns the skin
customer_reviews.text: it covers well but for a beard, still burns the skin.
customer_reviews.author: Spaghettisaurusrex

customer_reviews.title: Great price
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this product for several years, Walgreen's stopped selling it in their stores. I found it on Amazon and to my surprise it is at a terrific price. The price for three here is the same as two at Walgreen's.
customer_reviews.author: ntd19

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: excellent hair color five minutes your done great coverage both hair and beard....will use again
customer_reviews.author: CHOPPER

customer_reviews.title: Works well on beards as well
customer_reviews.text: I find this product works well on both my head and beard. I have tired various shades and lighter is better. Also, the 20 minutes is way to long for me.
customer_reviews.author: Fbill1

customer_reviews.title: Horrible hair color
customer_reviews.text: The color was not even close. Med brown turned my hair BLACK!Worse dye I have ever used.
customer_reviews.author: bennie

customer_reviews.title: Not for people with reactions from chemicals
customer_reviews.text: Does the job but still has all of the chemicals that cause my scalp to be irritated and itchy. Nothing "natural" about it.
customer_reviews.author: Neil

customer_reviews.title: Very good color, and long lasting!
customer_reviews.text: Really strong color and lasting too. Be careful how much you use and how long you leave it on for. I'd start with 10 minutes. I used this more than month ago, and it's still as brown as ever. I'll need to get a little more skillful at application the next time cause is covered too much gray. However, this is a great product, just take it easy the first time you try it!
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Kruzic

customer_reviews.title: I have been used for 4 years now. Follow the instructions
customer_reviews.text: I like the easy to use and the silky smooth texture that leaves in my hair . It’s last 4 weeks I wash my hair 3 times a week .
customer_reviews.author: teofilo laboy

customer_reviews.title: This takes longer to apply than Just For Men but ...
customer_reviews.text: This takes longer to apply than Just For Men but it lasts a couple of weeks longer. I only have to dye my hair once a month now.
customer_reviews.author: Shawn Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: I have used other products, but I think this is the best on the market. It lasts longer before washing out. Always very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Dean Williams

customer_reviews.title: didn't work. Want refund
customer_reviews.text: Used one out of the 3 that come with it and didn't work at all.
customer_reviews.author: Cesar Rosales

customer_reviews.title: Just didn't work
customer_reviews.text: This product didn't irritate my skin like others did but the color just rinsed out in the shower after the initial application.
customer_reviews.author: Christian Dunlap

customer_reviews.title: Happy Camper...!
customer_reviews.text: I was very unhappy that my local hair care outlet stopped offering this product for sale, but thanks to God and Ebay, I was able to find a new supplier... this Ebayer is great, and so is the product... thx.
customer_reviews.author: Hollywood

customer_reviews.title: This is the most natural looking hair color product I’ve ...
customer_reviews.text: This is the most natural looking hair color product I’ve ever used and I’ve been using it for years. Unfortunately, it hasn’t been sold in stores for years and you can only purchase it online. I have no idea why Clairol has stopped selling this product in stores.
customer_reviews.author: David Berelson

customer_reviews.title: Great price
customer_reviews.text: Very low price . Easy to use and the zipper is nice so you dont bake in the sun
customer_reviews.author: savvy saddler

customer_reviews.title: Saves a few dollars
customer_reviews.text: Saves a few dollars from buying it at local Walgr***s where that particular color was sporactically out of stock. This purchase comes in a vacuum package of 3 boxes boxed in a normal Amazon shipping box with bubblewrap.
customer_reviews.author: Polar Bear

customer_reviews.title: Good Product
customer_reviews.text: I used to purchase this product at Walgreen's. They stopped carrying it, so I was able to find on Amazon. Product is as described. This product is good. Did have an overall positive experience with form order to shipping.
customer_reviews.author: V. Telles

customer_reviews.title: Defected not happy
customer_reviews.text: Defected and unable to return. Waa on 5 minutes had to wash off burned my skin so bad left all red.
customer_reviews.author: cdog

customer_reviews.title: Good Product, Didn't Last as Long as I Wanted
customer_reviews.text: It was good it just didn't last as long as I though it would.
customer_reviews.author: Matt From Over Yonder

customer_reviews.title: Color Stayed longer
customer_reviews.text: Ya, as the name says for Men, I used woman hair colors in the past. I felt this color stayed longer on my hair.
customer_reviews.author: Ramesh K

customer_reviews.title: upset
customer_reviews.text: Do not like, highly upset and had high hopes my hair did not turn grey at all a waste of time and money.
customer_reviews.author: rome i.

customer_reviews.title: Great product cheap last forever not tested on animals and vegan
customer_reviews.text: Great product cheap last forever not tested on animals and vegan
customer_reviews.author: Roberto Cardella

customer_reviews.title: thick and easy to apply with minimal messed lasts at lest three ...
customer_reviews.text: Natural color, thick and easy to apply with minimal messed lasts at lest three to 4 weeks.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Blatt

customer_reviews.title: be careful or you might show up looking like a fool
customer_reviews.text: be careful or you might show up looking like a fool. This is not a touch of grey type of product. this is total color change. If you want black, you'll get black alright. Trouble is in a while black turns into a weird brownish grey, and watch where you splash it on because it does leave stains. Hard to beat the system of getting old. Good thing is you can us small amounts at a time. Experiment with short times and you may get away with it. potent stuff.
customer_reviews.author: George

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: A very good quality product, nice color, quickly getting results... Thanks alot
customer_reviews.author: Nice

customer_reviews.title: ... tried other products and this is by far the best..
customer_reviews.text: I have tried other products and this is by far the best... not too harsh, and doesn't turn your hair too dark too fast. Can't get it in stores anymore so i'm super happy that i found it on amazon!

customer_reviews.text: This Is A Great Product and super fast shipping and the price is right . Thank You
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth1686

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely Best Product on the Market.
customer_reviews.text: Great product that I can no longer find in Walgreen's. I'm glad that it is still available. BTW...For best results, don't start at your Sideburns where the gray is strongest or, leave it on for the whole 10: minutes as instructed. Instead, start at the height of about the top of your ears and work up and back from there. And, them do below that worst part last. Start your clock when you first start putting it on and rinse it off in 6-7: minutes. Yes, you will still have a little grey left but, at your age you should have at least some :} I promise it will look much more natural than the "Helmet" look of Dyed Hair.
customer_reviews.author: MisterHumour

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It's what I have been ordering for years just a package change

product_meta.title: Clairol Natural Instincts Semi-Permanent Hair Dye Kit for Men, Light Brown, 3 Count
product_meta.description: Size:3 Count| Color:M9 Light BrownThe day for gray is not today. With Clairol Natural Instincts Semi-Permanent Hair Dye Kit for Men, your hair color is yours to command. Blend away every last bit of gray and revamp your look with a surge of light brown color. Made without a drop of ammonia and packed with nourishing ingredients, like vitamin E, aloe, and protein, this hair dye for men looks and feels natural. Ten minutes is all you need for full coverage that lasts up to 28 shampoos. So, what are you waiting for? Be bold—seize your day.
feature_bullets: LOOK GROWN UP, NOT GRAY: Use the Clairol Natural Instincts Semi-Permanent Hair Dye Kit for Men to blast away the gray
A SURGE OF COLOR: Delivers light brown coloring that looks and feels natural
NOURISHING INGREDIENTS: Made with vitamin E, aloe, protein, and not a drop of ammonia
COVERAGE FOR DAYS: Full coverage that lasts up to 28 shampoos
THREE EASY STEPS: Mix color, apply root to tip, and rinse and condition—that’s it!
